system.description: The character knows how to use controlled strikes to stun and disable opponents without killing them.
system.benefit: As a Half Action, or when making a Charge Action, the character can declare they are making a Takedown Action against an opponent in melee. They roll to hit using any normal modifiers for weapons and Talents (including +20 for charging). If character hits, and would have done at least 1 Point of Damage after Armour/Toughness Reduction with their attack, they instead do no damage, and target makes +0 Toughness Test or is stunned for 1 Round and Knocked Prone. Additionally, character does not suffer -20 penalty to Weapon Skill when performing the Stun Action.

rollConfig.description: Takedown Action - melee attack to stun and knock prone

specialAbilities.name: Takedown Action
specialAbilities.description: Half Action or Charge. Attack normally. If hit would deal 1+ damage (after armor/toughness), target makes Toughness test or is stunned 1 round and knocked prone.
